"Matsu Tsuko led the Lion armies against Hida Kisada at Otosan Uchi. Before her army met with Kisada, an Imperial decree arrived, ordering her to let the army fight without her. The Lion army was destroyed, and so was Tsuko as she watched the brutal massacre." - The Battle of Otosan Uchi
"Toturi is dead, and his 'thousand years of peace' are dead with him. Someone must have the courage to lead Rokugan to its new destiny." - Yoritomo

"With courage, the watchful eye of a noble daimyo, and battlefield promotions, one or two of them may become taisa."
The Emerald Magistrates continue to enforce the Emperor's laws, but the Imperial Legions follow the Shogun's orders.
"Toturi is dead, and his 'thousand years of peace' are dead with him. Someone must have the courage to lead Rokugan to its new destiny." - Yoritomo

flavor: Gusai was a former Mantis Champion, revered by the clan but reviled by the Empire.
text:
This Follower has +1F while you control a Port.
Battle, [bow]: Ranged 2 Attack.
designernotes: Art - A bound and gagged Kaiu Esumi lays on a beach. Nearby, a group of scummy and shady mantis pirates sit around a beached kobune, sharpening weapons and gambling as they wait for orders. Gusai the original family name of the Mantis, but was lost when the Mantis Champion kidnapped an imperial Heir, so I thought it would be a nice throwback for the Kidnapping card.

text:
This Follower has +1F while you control a Port.

designernotes: This is Kanpeki's suprisingly large force conveniently nearby when the Second City fight spills into the streets

text:
Invest :g1:: Search your deck for a Spider Elite Sohei, show it, and put it in your hand.
Battle: Fear 3.
title: Spider Elite Sohei

designernotes: Notes - A young geisha being trained in the art by a more experienced one.

text:

flavor: There is no shortage of samurai willing to lead an ill-fated charge.

(You may Equip a Reserve attachment, if it would be opposed, as a Battle action.)

designernotes: Art depicting a couple of attendants suiting up a samurai in their armor in preparation for battle.

text:

Engage, :bow:: Create and attach a +2F/+0C Armor Item to this Personality. Remove it from the game after this battle ends.

"I am defeated," Shunsuko said. "Claim your victory, Crab."
Esumi lowered his guard. "Kill a priestess? Shame my ancestors? I think not."
designernotes: 2013 Kotei result. Kaiu Esumi spares Isawa Shunsuko honorably.

text:
(Draw a card after your Expendable card dies.)
This Personality cannot attack.

designernotes: 2013 Kotei results. Utaku Lishan spares Hida kaiji honorably

text:

After this unit moves, give this Follower +1F.

designernotes: 2013 Kotei result. Matsu Hachigo spares Asako karachu dishonorably

text: This Follower has a Force bonus equal to this Personality's Personal Honor.

designernotes: 2013 Kotei result. Yoritomo Emoto takes Yasuki Makoto hostage.

text: :bow:: Produce 2 Gold, which may only pay for one Economic action's cost.

designernotes: 2013 Kotei result. Shinjo Sarang takes Doji Moro hostage

(Once per turn, as an Absent Engage, move your unbowed Personality in a Cavalry unit to the battle.)

text: Repeatable Battle, :bow:: Ranged 3 Attack. (Repeatable actions may be taken any number of times per turn.)

designernotes: Hachiro's troops reconning the Scorpion lands for Dairuko. Experienced and battle-hardened Lion veterans.

flavor: Some among the Brotherhood find that anonymity is a boon in the hunt for enlightenment.
designernotes: One of those basket-headed monks, carrying a traveling staff and walking down a dirt path in a poor village. He should have large prayer beads around his neck and carrry a flute somewhere on his person.

text: While you control one or more Rings, this Follower has Expendable. While you control two or more Rings, this Personality has Cavalry. While you control three or more Rings, this Follower has +1F.

text:
(You may Equip a Reserve attachment, if it would be opposed, as a Battle action.)
After this Follower is destroyed by another player's action or by battle resolution, put it in your hand.

He should be heavily armed with various weaponry (yari, daisho, no-dachi, bow and arrows). He should appear slightly amused.

text:
(Once per turn, as an Absent Engage, move your unbowed Personality in a Cavalry unit to the battle.)

Fear effects, Melee Attacks, and Ranged Attacks targeting this Follower have -1 strength.
